scale = 25
p = 4 * a(1)
scale = 20
s(0)
s(0.5)
s(1)
s(-0.5)
s(-1)
s(p / 7)
s(-p / 7)
s(3 * p / 4)
s(3 * -p / 4)
s(p)
s(-p)
s(3 * p / 2)
s(3 * -p / 2)
s(2 * p)
s(2 * -p)

s(-131231)
